title: conferred on it by section 12(5) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Migration of Participating Securities
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Migration of Participating Securities 

Act 2019 (Appointment of Live Date) (Section 12(5)) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on the 12th day of March 2021. 

Definitions and interpretation.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited migration participating security act 2019 (appointment live date) (section 12(5)) order 2021 (2) order come operation 12th day march 2021 definition interpretation

title: conferred on it by section 12(5) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 2. (1) In this Order, “Act of 2019” means the Migration of Participating
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order, “Act of 2019” means the Migration of Participating 

Securities Act 2019 (No. 50 of 2019). 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and which is also used 
in the Act of 2019 has the same meaning in this Order as it has in the Act of
text_norm: 2 (1) order act 2019 mean migration participating security act 2019 (no 50 2019) (2) word expression used order also used act 2019 meaning order act

title: conferred on it by section 12(5) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: Appointment of live date.
text_raw:
2019. 

Appointment of live date.
text_norm: 2019 appointment live date

title: conferred on it by section 12(5) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: 3. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the 15th day of March 2021 at 00:01 hours
text_raw:
3. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the 15th day of March 2021 at 00:01 hours 
is appointed as the live date for the purposes of section 12(5) of the Act of 
2019, for those participating issuers referred to in the Schedule which have 
consented to the migration of participating securities to a nominated central 
securities depository, in accordance with the Act of 2019. 

(2) The appointment of the live date in paragraph (1) applies in respect of 
those participating issuers referred to in the Schedule, which have consented to 
the migration of participating securities to a nominated central securities 
depository, in accordance with the Act of 2019. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [111] 3 

Article 3(2)
text_norm: 3 (1) subject paragraph (2) 15th day march 2021 00 01 hour appointed live date purpose section 12(5) act 2019 participating issuer referred schedule consented migration participating security nominated central security depository accordance act 2019 (2) appointment live date paragraph (1) applies respect participating issuer referred schedule consented migration participating security nominated central security depository accordance act 2019 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 16th march 2021 111 3 article 3(2)

title: conferred on it by section 12(5) of the Migration of Participating Securities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Order and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Order and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order appoints the live date for the purposes of section 12(5) of the 
Migration of Participating Securities Act 2019.
